yarn a merino worsted - fireflies - 218yds/100gm - yarn b notions stitch marker to mark bor scissors darning needle optional poof/pom notes/tutorials * two color brioche in the round - continental 2 color brioche in the round - this includes how to brk brp sl1yo * brlsl decrease - brioche left slanting decrease * brrsl decrease - brioche right slanting decrease * due to the stretchiness of the boucle and the brioche this hat is knit with a smaller gauge needle and will still create a very stretchy hat * pom video by jess from suchbullknit https //youtu be/shpltfy3gxu si=l6eo6tum2n9nydnj patterncopyrightrachelkeener paisleypurlyarn2024 2 glossary bor - beginning of round brk - brioche knit brp - brioche purl brrsl decrease - slip the first stitch knit wise with it s yo knit the next stitch pass the slipped stitch over place back on the left hand needle and pass the following stitch over place stitch back on the right hand needle brlsl decrease - slip the first stitch knit wise brk the following two stitches together pass the slipped stitch over k - knit p - purl pm - place marker sm - slip marker sl1yo - bring yarn to the front slip next stitch and bring yarn to the back while slipping ssk - slip 1 stitch as if to knit slip the next stitch as if to purl place back on the left hand needle and knit though the back loop instructions using your boucle yarn yarn a and the long tail cast-on method or your preferred cast-on for hats loosely cast on 72 stitches place your bor marker join to knit in the round being careful not to twist brim round 1 yarn a *k1 p1* to bor repeating the following round you will work in 1x1 rib until the brim measures 2 5 inches body set up round yarn a *k1 sl1yo* to bor round 1 yarn b *sl1yo brp* to bor patterncopyrightrachelkeener paisleypurlyarn2024 3 round 2 yarn a *brk sl1yo* to bor repeat rounds 1 and 2 until the hat measures 7 5 inches from the cast-on edge ending with round 1 yarn b crown shaping/decreases round 1 yarn a brk sl1yo x3 brrsl decrease sl1yo brlsl decrease sl1yo brk sl1yo x2 pm repeat three more times to bor 16 sts decreased 56 sts remaining round 2 yarn b *sl1yo brp* to bor round 3 yarn a *brk sl1yo* to bor round 4 yarn b *sl1yo brp* to bor round 5 yarn a *brk sl1yo* to bor round 6 yarn b *sl1yo brp* to bor round 7 yarn a *brk sl1yo* to bor round 8 yarn b *sl1yo brp* to bor round 9 yarn a brk sl1yo x2 brrsl decrease sl1yo brlsl decrease
